name: ChronoBreak (the_z0ne)
description:
The Game made for the COMP 376 class during the Fall 2020 Semester at Concordia University.

Warning, the game is pretty unoptimized at the moment, especially the 'Nature1' Level

Controls:

Esc - Pause/Resume
WASD - Movement
LShift - Dash
Ctrl - Slide
Space - Jump
Q - Drop Weapon
R - Throw Weapon
E - Pickup Weapon
